jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: We are looking for a talented Frontend Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have experience with React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.
requirements: Understanding of modern web development practices

jobs.title: UX/UI Designer
jobs.description: Join our creative team as a UX/UI Designer. We're looking for someone who can create beautiful and functional interfaces for our clients' projects.
requirements: Experience with Figma and Adobe Creative Suite
Strong portfolio of web and mobile designs

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: We're seeking a Backend Developer to help build and maintain our cloud-based services. Experience with Node.js and databases is required.
requirements: Strong knowledge of Node.js and Express
Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases

jobs.title: Data Analyst Intern
jobs.description: Great opportunity for students to gain hands-on experience in data analysis. We'll teach you the tools and techniques used in modern data analytics.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Looking for a DevOps Engineer to help us automate and optimize our deployment processes. Experience with cloud platforms is essential.
